**ANNOUNCEMENT** 

The Chimney Company is proudly celebrating its 25TH Anniversary of providing excellent service. 

We are extremely grateful to our loyal clients and customers. You are the main reason we were able to continue over the years. 

We also could not have reached this milestone without the hard work and support of our amazing team. They are the reason for all our achievements and success. 

I want to thank my family and close friends for all the love and support.

We look forward to continue serving our clients and our community. 

William Bassels
-The Chimney Company Inc.
________________________

The Chimney Company founder, William Bassels has been in the construction and real estate business for over 25 years. 
In 1994 he began specializing in the chimney building & repair and lining industry. 
He would obtain his W.E.T.T. certificates for “Technician and Sweep” and "SITE Basic Inspector" shortly after. 
Not being completely satisfied he contacted “Toronto Municipal Licensing & Standards” to be tested for chimney repairs and installation. 
He passed the exam and obtained  a license as a “Chimney Repairman”.

In 1997 The Chimney Company was officially incorporated and carries all the necessary credentials, license, certificates, workers coverage, liability insurance and guarantees. 

Our professional staff and crew look forward to making your experience with us memorable.

Please keep in mind that we have Full liability Insurance & WSIB Coverage.

Call us now 416-722-2224
